subproject.description:
The project will support efforts in Novi Pazar to pursue its strategic vision, equal opportunities for all, healthy population, preserved environment and cultural heritage for tourism development. To that effect following actions will be undertaken (i) improvement of water supply in a Roma settlement, (ii) environment cleaning for improved schooling through community actions and (iii) visibility enhancement for attractive tourist sites.

The project will be executed by the regional development Agency SEDA and will thus contribute to building up of its management and implementation capacities.
subproject.title: Green Actions in Novi Pazar

title: Inclusive Development and Green Actions in Novi Pazar
